title: Finger painting
brief_description: Demonstrates the activities of children creating patterns in paint working with the hands, fingers and thumbs. Quotes a recipe for making special finger paint; shows the use of special paper; demonstrates actual teaches for applying colour. This film is designed to leave the imagination free.
